descripcion:
Recommended for acid loving plants such as Camellia, Mountain Laurel, Azaleas, Rhododendrons, or Blueberries. This formula has high potential acidity and containes sulfur. Also contains magnesium, and chelated micronutrients. High ammonium, low nitrate nitrogen.

DERIVED FROM: Ammonium Sulfate, Potassium Nitrate, Urea, Ammonium Phosphate, Magnesium Sulfate, Monopotassium Phosphate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 1465 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
